thread.title: Northwestern's Haley Hebelka is lehighvalleylive Girls Soccer Player of Week
thread.title_full: Northwestern's Haley Hebelka is lehighvalleylive Girls Soccer Player of Week

title: Northwestern's Haley Hebelka is lehighvalleylive Girls Soccer Player of Week
text:
By Josh Folck | For lehighvalleylive.com on October 21, 2015 2:10 PM, updated October 21, 2015 3:31 PM 
GIRLS SOCCER PLAYER OF THE WEEK Haley Hebelka (Josh Folck | For lehighavalleylive.com ) 
The senior defender put the Tigers into the Colonial League championship game with a goal late in the first-half against top-seeded Saucon Valley on Tuesday night. 
It came off a corner kick from freshman midfielder Maggie Motolese with 1:25 left before halftime. 
Hebelka's second career goal gave the Tigers a chance to win their third straight league title on Thursday night against Southern Lehigh. 
It was the first loss for the Panthers against a Colonial League team all season. 
Honorable mention: Sr. Baleigh Bradey , Southern Lehigh; Jr. F Chelsea Hudson , Parkland; Sr. GK Regan Allsop , Parkland; So. GK Madelyn Nicholas , Palisades; GK Ellie Cassel , Southern Lehigh; Sr. M Heather Tostevin , North Hunterdon; GK Christine Fox , Belvidere; Erika Antunes , Notre Dame; Sr. M Hana Cicerelle , Warren Hills.
